title: BRIEF-Zacd Group Says New Real Estate Fund For Australia Hotel Portfolio To Be Established
text:
BRIEF-Zacd Group Says New Real Estate Fund For Australia Hotel Portfolio To Be Established

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 22:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zacd Group Says New Real Estate Fund For Australia Hotel Portfolio To Be Established Sept 20 (Reuters) - ZACD Group Ltd : * NEW REAL ESTATE FUND FOR AUSTRALIA HOTEL PORTFOLIO WILL BE ESTABLISHED * ZACD AUSTRALIA HOSPITALITY FUND WILL HAVE ESTIMATED FUND SIZE OF ABOUT S$45 MILLION TO BE RAISED

BRIEF-Zacd Group Says New Real Estate Fund For Australia Hotel Portfolio To Be Established
